column1: beðinn ‎(“asked, requested”)  biðja konu ‎(“to ask in marriage”)
column3: biðjask fyrir ‎(“to say one's prayers”)  biðjask undan ‎(“to excuse oneself”)

column1: Danish: bede  Faroese: biðja  Icelandic: biðja
